4.27.18  11:43 am   So your floating down the street in your wire canoe when all of the sudden the wheel falls off.  So, how many pancakes does it take to cover the roof of a dog house?

     

5.26.17  7:18 pm   if i have a computer, how many pancakes will fit on the roof?

     

5.25.17  5:25 pm   if you have 4 pencils and i have 7 apples, how many pancakes will fit on the roof?

     

4.27.17  10:30 am   If a hen and a half can lay an egg and a half in a day and a half, how many pancakes does it take to shingle a doghouse?

     

1.7.17  10:03 am   If Mary gives George 34.6 baseball cards and 11 pancakes can fit on the roof, how many apples can Pedro buy with 1 human soul?

     

4.9.16  1:28 pm   If you're walking down he street in a rowboat, and your wings fall off, how many pancakes does it take to shingle a doghouse? Answer: 4, because ice cream has no bones.
